actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain real property in Lane County, Oregon, to certain persons who purchased and held such land in good faith reliance on an inaccurate surveyor's map.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to grant title to certain real property located in Lane County, Oregon, to persons who were deprived of title as a result of a survey by the Bureau of Land Management.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain real property in Lane County, Oregon, to certain persons who purchased and held such land in good faith reliance on an inaccurate surveyor's map.
